name: Save new Jitbit tickets to a Google Sheets row
description: Every time a new ticket is created in Jitbit, Make will automatically add that ticket to a new row in your Google Sheets spreadsheet. The template uses this [example spreadsheet](https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/1oz6zX4SVSOWn6PYqezGxvZrsUMUW8mNvLFlMcLxIBTc/edit?usp=sharing).
